name: Baron Bunny
description:
When your active character takes DMG: Decrease DMG taken by 2.
Usage(s): 1. When the Usages are depleted, this card will not be discarded.
At the End Phase, if Usage(s) have been depleted: Discard this card to deal 2 Pyro DMG.
